short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fills all input fields on a webpage with a specified value/text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly autofill forms and reclaim your time! A powerful form automation tool designed to streamline your workflow and boost productivity.

Key Features
⚡ Quick Text Fill

Instantly fill multiple text fields with a single value
Perfect for testing, data entry, and form completion
Custom value input for maximum flexibility

Perfect For:

👨‍💻 Web Developers
🧪 QA Testers
📊 Data Entry Specialists
📝 Form Administrators
🎓 Doctors, Teachers and Students
👥 Anyone who deals with repetitive form filling

What's new in 2.0?

⚡ Added Maximum Number Auto-Detection feature
⚡ Added Minimum Number Auto-Detection feature
⚡ Introduced Dropdown Selection system
